extendedInfo.description: **Verified Facebook Account Required**Free My Apps is an awesome way to discover great apps, and get rewarded!Our sponsors want you to fall in love with their free apps and they will reward you for trying!You get to explore some great free apps and get rewards like Amazon and iTunes gift cards, Hulu+ subscriptions, and many more great prizes!What are you waiting for? You just need a Facebook account and then you can start freeing those apps!

reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.comment: Best app ever! I found so much games that I have became in love with. What makes this app even better is that u get paid to play them! Can this get any better? I don\'t think so
reviews.author: eman isa

reviews.title: Great and easy to use
reviews.comment: Works great and its easy to make lots of money fast
reviews.author: Serge Lamarre

reviews.title: Over $80 earned. IOS has more opportunities though:(
reviews.comment: I have this on my iPod, iPad, 2 iPhones, Galaxy S3, Htc One & new Nexus 7. I have earned soo many gift cards for Amazon. Unfortunately, there are better offers and more opportunities on the IOS version rather than Android. I hope to see more apps on Android soon! It would also be nice if they got refreshed once a week. I see the same apps on here constantly and the max amount of credits they are worth is around 50. On IOS, all apps are at least 100 credits each, that means with 3 apps you get $1 in Amazon!
reviews.author: Emi Onti

reviews.title: Fix the issue
reviews.comment: I\'ve email you for about 4 times. My phone is ideaphone lenovo s880. And your word is like this \"Contact Us Looks like we\'re having trouble enrolling your phone or tablet.  Please contact us for assistance to get started with FreeMyApps: support@freemyapps.com\" Just do some action no need your work. I\'ve uninstall thx
reviews.author: edria andhika

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Helps me save a lot of money on amazon. Sometimes it doesn\'t give me points for the apps, so that\'s something to work on. Good job guys!
reviews.author: XilentBeast

reviews.title: Some bugs in giving credits
reviews.comment: I shared the app with 2 of my friends and they installed it from the link I sent (I chose the sms way ) and opened it and installed apps and I still didn\'t get any credits and I even downloaded a bunch of apps but didn\'t get a single credit. I know it from iOS it was a lot better
reviews.author: JAWAD ABORSHED

reviews.title: INVALID  CODE GOOGLE PLAY 10$
reviews.comment: After redeemed gift for Google Play 10$, the code giving for claim is invalid! Rubbish Apps!
reviews.author: Soh Jin Wei

reviews.title: Should add more giftcard
reviews.comment: Nice app but you should put iTunes gift card and I will give it 5 star .
reviews.author: ahmad abed

reviews.comment: Seems like a good idea. Works fine. If I can redeem my points for a Google play voucher I\'ll give it 5 stars.
reviews.author: Chris Lord

reviews.title: Its ok...
reviews.comment: This is the only gift card type app ive found that actually gives you points for installing apps,others claim to but the points never show up. The only problem i have with this app is that they have verry few apps and they only seem to get new ones about every 2-3 weeks so it makes earning point go very slowly.would give 5 stars if there was more potential to earn more points
reviews.author: Jeremy Thomas

reviews.title: Best Gift App Ever
reviews.comment: This app is amazing its fast to get credits and also easy it actually works got a 10$ google play gift card i love you free my apps the only gift program thats actually workes thank you so much :D
reviews.author: CubicBurrito45

reviews.title: Missing credits
reviews.comment: This app is a joke, not only does it give you one app a day but after trying the first 2 and getting credit, I haven\'t received credit for the last two. Also how does a $5 donation cost more points than a $5 gift card. That is a joke
reviews.author: Alban Pajova

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Its great I have 5 dollars but its hard see the whole app description so its not clear what you\'d have to do to get the credits please fix
reviews.author: swagata chakroborty

reviews.title: Wutta rip off
reviews.comment: 700,857 gone missing like that. Where my points go?
reviews.author: Tiffany F

reviews.title: Mostly happy with this app.
reviews.comment: My only complaint so far is that some of the ad banners cut of the text describing redemption requirements. Mostly you just open after installing but some have different requirements and can\'t be read to find out what they are, fix this and 5 stars from me. Update: Lowered my rating because they took of the 10 dollar Google play gift card right when I got enough points to get it, WTF!!
reviews.author: Josh Deason

reviews.title: LG optimus l9
reviews.comment: Love the app...when are there more offer for other apps.???
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Better than all
reviews.comment: Best money making app out there . Tried them all.
reviews.author: Tyler Strudel

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: I\'ve used FMA on iOS and  redeemed $50 in gift cards! Amazing service!!!
reviews.author: Dillon Chalupsky

reviews.title: I can\'t even remember how many gift cards I have redeemed!
reviews.comment: This is a great app. There are no hidden try this deal and put in your info gimmicks.  All you have to do is open the app and try some new apps! I actually have wound up keeping quite a few so it is a win win.  It takes little time and the rewards don\'t take forever to add up.  In Tue past month I received at least $25 of Amazon gift cards.  And they have a really large selection.  As other users mentioned from time to time points don\'t show but especially recently they have been great and given the credits
reviews.author: Dan Lockwood

reviews.title: What happend?
reviews.comment: My list of apps are gone! I have one on there and I downloaded it an,d haven\'t received my credits! Fix asap!!!
reviews.author: King Mitchell
